thread.title: One person critical after tanker collision
thread.title_full: One person critical after tanker collision | News24

author: news24.com
title: One person critical after tanker collision
text:
Durban - Five people were injured – one critically, after two trucks and a car collided on the N2 North at the Doonside off ramp on Saturday.
Netcare 911 spokesperson Chris Botha said a report from the scene indicated that a truck with a load of oil was traveling in the slow lane when a tanker collided into it from the rear.
A car with four occupants then slammed into the rear of the tanker, he said.
“Netcare 911 paramedics and other services arrived at the scene and found the highway obstructed with accident debris, oil and the twisted frames of the vehicles.
